plugins.name: blueprint-dev
plugins.description: Planning-first, design-driven development workflow with A/B design variants, architecture robustness checks, trunk-based development enforcement, predefined agent team swarms, and compound knowledge accumulation. Stack-agnostic with auto-detection.

plugins.name: design-studio
plugins.description: Code-first design exploration workflow with optional brand discovery. Build a brand identity through interactive Q&A, generate standalone HTML variants from text descriptions, compare in browser, extract design tokens, and ship as production Next.js components.
